title: The.Tom.and.Jerry.Show.S01E13.WEB-DL.x264.AAC
description:
The Tom and Jerry Show - Season 1 - Episode 13 (WEB-DL - MP4)
-------------------------------------------------------------

The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in The Tom and Jerry Show, a fresh
take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility
of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition
lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry
two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts,
each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each
other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines
where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle
or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing
a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

Produced by Renegade Animation and Warner Bros. Animation.


"Dinner is Swerved": When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone,
Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends over for a
romantic dinner. But things don't go as planned.

"Bottled Up Emotions": A love-potion formula accidentally
gets on Jerry when Napoleon tries to use it against Tom.
